import React from 'react' import { Button, Modal } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' const MovieModal = (props) => { const { id } = useParams() console.log(id) return (
Modal heading
{ allMovies.data.results?.slice(0, 200).map((movie) => ( setModalShow(true)} key={movie.id} className='w-40 h-40 mx-4 my-2 hover:border-purple-800 hover:text-gray-200 border-blue-600 border-b-2 hover:bg-blue-800 rounded-full' > {shortTitle(movie.title)} {movie.id} ) ) }
) } export default MovieModal
